channel.description: CC 410 - Week 9 This Week 10/25 - Milestone 6: Design Patterns & Mocks 10/25 - Final Project 3 Next Week 11/1 - External Libraries Example Following Week 11/8 - Releases Example 11/8 - Milestone 7: Checkout Milestone 6 Orders & Combos Design Patterns Factory Method, Builder, Singleton, Iterator Unit Tests with Doubles Few GUI Changes Testing Issues Limited Memory (512 MB) Java: gradle --stop Project -> Restart Box Refresh Browser Python: run tests in batches Looking Ahead Next Modules - Web Interface Smaller Milestones More Final Project Time Image Credit: Giphy
